subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Calm thyself-again and again and again.....
author: eamonn mgherbi
full_text:
--0-2043436748-1250585173=:54574
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Lol I think we should stick a pin in this conversation. to be fair Frank on=
ly mentioned what he heard, at the end of the day any voices we get we just=
 report and say it how it is. you never know these voices could be fooling =
us, or are they could be=A0talking about another reality...lol are human br=
ains are too small to understand what is really going on. (i probably could=
 have picked a better term :-) ) in relation to the 15th, there was in fact=
 a big change in atrological terms which we all know is about planets, moon=
 bla de bla... and apparently atmospheric conditions do change slightly. th=
is period last till the 9th of spetmeber or i think 7oth october.... but st=
ill there was something that may be more significant to the voices then us.=
 

I dont know guys but lets just work together on this, I do honestly stil=
l think there was more to the 15th, being a complete old hat EVP experiment=
or I recieved quotes about the 15th of august on my Revox Reel to Reel, I d=
ont think the dates were specifically linked to something happening in the =
states as I live in the Cotswolds in the UK and I recieved voices about thi=
s. I gotta admit though I recorded a damn good voice yesterday which was ve=
ry clear...best so far (ill upload this soon as I get my revox connected to=
 Laptop) 

Its cool that you did question this but Frank was just saying wh=
at he heard,...has anybody else caught any interesting dates at all??

have=
 a good day all!




________________________________
From: sonny_mtl_can <=
sonny_mtl_can@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, 18 Augu=
st, 2009 3:31:16
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Calm thyself-again and again and ag=
ain.....

=A0 
=A0
If you allow me to make a joke:
Your warning was about t=
he warming of the weather, it's hot here! It's a warning/warming spirit way=
 of speaking.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:
>
=
> If you like to post some (future) predictions for this year with clear da=
tes and events, feel free.=A0 If you have advice to Frank and others on how=
 to better interact with their voices and acquire clearer more understandab=
le messages, that would be useful.=A0 And if you'd like to explain further =
how I am "wrong" that the world did not end on August 15 as was predicted, =
please do so. But throwing a little tantrum with no constructive criticism =
doesn't really allow much productive conversation, if I may say so.
> 
> 
>=
 
> --- On Sun, 8/16/09, David Koenig floridajakeblues@ ... wrote:
> 
> Fro=
m: David Koenig floridajakeblues@ ...
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Calm thyself=
-again and again and again.....
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
> Date: Sund=
ay, August 16, 2009, 8:58 PM
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> =A0
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> RJ ..=
 Please excuse me ... you are obviously WRONG ... How's that?
> 
> On Sun, =
Aug 16, 2009 at 11:56 PM, David Koenig <floridajakeblues@ gmail.com> wrote:=

> 
> JR... Wake up !!!!!
> 
> On Sun, Aug 16, 2009 at 6:37 PM, Rj rasterer=
@yahoo. com> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> =A0
> 
> 
>=
 
> 
> 
> Twisting a prediction after the fact to fit circumstances is one =
of the biggest mistakes (or biggest cop-outs, or biggest lies) a would-be f=
uture-teller makes.=A0 The predictions you were touting were for August 15,=
 and included end-of-the-world warning..=A0 Trying to say these were correc=
t, but not REALLY for August 15, and not REALLY end-of-the-world stuff, see=
ms like a way to save face, or keep hoping the messages are real, when in f=
act, this is another example that they are not.
> 
> 
> 
> So from now on, =
you will no longer hear clear dates and predictions.=A0 You may hear vague =
dates and vague predictions if you like, but you will not hear anything tha=
t can be confirmed.=A0 Doing so would put you in a position of having to qu=
estion the verity of the EVP data you collect.=A0 And that might lead to ab=
andoning this while area of study.=A0 And we
> know you cannot do that.
> 
=
> 
> 
> --- On Sun, 8/16/09, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wr=
ote:
> 
> 
> 
> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
> Subject=
: [EVP-ITC] Calm thyself-again and again and again.....
> To: evp-itc@yahoo=
groups .com
> 
> 
> Date: Sunday, August 16, 2009, 3:08 PM
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>=
 
> =A0
> 
> 
> =A0Well, it seems the original prediction of the east coast=
 getting clobbered is probably correct. Where=A0I fell down was trying to a=
sk questions and getting BS doomsville junk. I knew it's a mistake=A0to ask=
 questions, that like opens the door for the dark dorks. I'm going back to =
just announcing I'm doing an EVP recording, and just record. They know what=
 I'm thinking and what I need to know and who I would like to hear from. As=
king questions, at least for me, has always lead to problems. I'm not like =
others, presumming I'm so smart and know what is=A0talking, and if it's hon=
est, like most of=A0the box experts out there on the web. You know, the one=
s doing pod casts, radio shows=A0and proclaiming this that and the other th=
ing. 
> 
> 
> 
> =A0
> =A0
> =A0
> =A0Frank-S
